title: Did Vice President Mike Pence Warn Against ‘Gay Aliens’?
subtitle: “Let’s say, for example, that these gay aliens can assume human form. What’s to stop them from infiltrating normal bakeries and baking cakes for gay weddings? I
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Vice President Mike Pence proposed using a planned U.S. "Space Force" to defend against attacks from "outer-space gays."
